titleStmt.title: World Wide Diplomatic Archives Index: Armenia
Armenia

div.head: Legislation
div.p: The Armenian Legislature passed a Law on Freedom of Information in 2003. Researchers may request access to diplomatic archives, though the rules are slightly different for foreign nationals than for Armenian citizens.

div.head: Location
div.p: Ministry of Foreign Affairs: Government House #2, Republic Square, Yerevan 0010

div.head: Procedures
div.p: Researchers should contact the Diplomatic Archives at the Ministry of Foreign Affairs to inquire about access to their records. Older records are available at the National Archives.
